title: Sharpshooter
content:
Sharpshooter Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules. Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage. (You can toggle this on or off).

Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules.

Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage. (You can toggle this on or off).

Sharpshooter is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat. (Note this feat is not available in EA and all info is subject to change.)

Sharpshooter Information

Your ranged weapon attacks do not receive penalties from High Ground Rules. Ranged weapon attacks with weapons you are Proficient with have a -5 penalty to their Attack Roll, but deal an additional 10 damage. (You can toggle this on or off). How to unlock Sharpshooter

All Classes at Level 4

Sharpshooter Tips & Notes

Works with Tavern Brawler and Dueling. You can toggle this off for Battle Master, so you don't have to choose when to take sharpshooter shots and regular shots. Notes & Tips go here
